title: Chinese Pork Spare Ribs with Chestnuts
ingredients: ['Marinade', '1/2 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 tablespoon light soy sauce or 1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '1-2 tablespoons cornflour mixed in 1 tablespoon water', '450g pork spare ribs, chopped into 2.5 cm pieces', '8 chestnuts', '2 tablespoons groundnut oil, divided', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '4-6 potatoes, peeled and diced', '1 spring onion, diced', 'Sauce', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', 'water as needed', 'salt to taste']
